page.title: 19Words We Use
page.content: We use some words in Rothbury which may be used in other parts of the country with a different meaning. Here is my list; MUCKLE = very CANNY = quite SOZ = sorry HOY = throw NOW = hello LUSH = nice RADGE = stupid HACKY = dirty CHOWED = bothered CLARTS = mud MAN is a word used with feeling to show anger or displeasure and is directed at a male or female. SOZ but I got MUCKLE HACKY COS HE HOYED me in the CLARTS and wasn't CHOWED. = Sorry but I got very dirty because he threw me in the mud and was not bothered. MAN!
